column2: The use of low-molecular-weight PEIs as gene carriers in the monkey fibroblastoma and rabbit smooth muscle cell cultures. Production of functional recombinant tyrosine hydroxylase by the BPV-1 expression plasmids in the cell cultures. Effect of cell-surface glycosaminoglycans on cationic carrier combined with low-MW PEI-mediated gene transfection. Intracellular trafficking of nonviral vectors.
